name: Signature Advertising
description: We work with amazing local clients and a number of the world's most recognized brands â€” not too bad for a little agency that began in a home office. We've come a long way, but never lost focus on what matters most: results. We could say we're an advertising agency, but that doesn't seem to cover it. We've tackled everything from brochures to websites, created logos, radio and TV spots and guerilla marketing tactics. It's not so much about what we do, it's what you need.
